Wilmington.Northwood, Delaware:
Northwood is an unincorporated community in New Castle County, Delaware, United States.


== Geography ==
Northwood is located at 39°47′45″N 75°30′09″W with an elevation of 259 feet (79 m) above sea level. It is located with Delaware Route 3 (Marsh Road), Hayman Place, Lynnfield and Webster Farm on the west, Carrcroft Crest on the south, Winterhaven on the northwest, and Green Acres on the east.
